channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IA

item.title: Report E-2024050648
item.description:
Report E-2024050648

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-30T18:16:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-07
  • City: FAIRFAX
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: CEDAR RAPIDS AND IOWA CITY RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During his inspection a IAIS carman found tank car UTLX 208132 leaking from the bottom cap. CIC carman was sent out to try and repair the car. It was found that the BOV was defective and the car was bad ordered. The alcohols NOS was transloaded to a different car. Currently waiting for a OTMA to return the car to POET home shop
